Name: Magic Sexyland
About the game: Join our protagonist Adam the magician on his journey through Sexyland! Let's get back to Medieval Ages, times when people were more perverted than ever. Everything is possible here! Horny girls, sexy fairies, angel beauties and devilish babes await you! Help Adam solve interesting and funny point and click puzzles, save girls from the goblin, majestic evil eagle, dukes and rats! Be eaten by a two-headed giant frog and escape alive! Explore the castle, dungeons of hell, and heights of the heaven, walk through magical forests filled with strange creatures, take a hot air balloon and fly up to the mountains… … and be rewarded! Guide Adam till the end, save the gorgeous princess from the evil eagle and become a prince of Magic Sexyland! Puzzles, interactive sex scenes, animated intros and cut scenes – everything is combined into one long solid story. Everything is carefully 100% hand drawn. What are you waiting for? Adventures await you! Key Features • 30+ classical, logic, point and click puzzle solving levels • 35+ interactive, uncensored sex scenes • Multiple cumshot scenes endings • 5+ different environment themes • Lots of fantasy, evil creatures you need to defeat • Lots of interactive cut scenes • 100% hand drawn • No DRM • Link to ask for the help on Discord
